casebody.data:
William L. BROWN
v.
Mark P. ELLIS. No. 389P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, Lee M. Cecil, High Point, for Brown. T. Keith Black, William F. Patterson, Jr., Greensboro, for Ellis.

Prio report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 646 S.E.2d 408.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of April 2008 by Plaintiff for Leave to Supplement Petition for Writ of Certiorari, Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
